name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】魔法少女ホロウィッチ！THE STAGE【#ホロウィッチ】 [WV2_cgUA8cc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A flashback sequence showing a girl's desk and her internal monologue as she succumbs to dark energy.
A 3D live performance of the song 'Aishite Aishite Aishite' on a grand stage with visual effects and choreography.
A purple creature transforms amidst dark energy, and the characters react in shock.

subtitles.original: あんなに好きだった魔法少女も
subtitles.english: The magical girl I loved so much,

subtitles.original: 見れば見るほど虚しくなって
subtitles.english: the more I look at her, the emptier I feel.

subtitles.original: あんなふうになれなかったんだなーって
subtitles.english: Thinking, "I couldn't become like that..."

subtitles.original: どうしてもそう思っちゃって
subtitles.english: I just can't help but think that.

subtitles.original: やだ...
subtitles.english: No...

subtitles.original: やだよ...
subtitles.english: I don't want to...

subtitles.original: 好きなものくらい...
subtitles.english: At least my favorite things...

subtitles.original: ずっと好きでいたいのに！
subtitles.english: ...I want to keep loving them forever!

subtitles.original:
愛して愛して愛して
作詞・作曲: きくお
subtitles.english:
Love Me, Love Me, Love Me
Lyrics & Composition: Kikuo

subtitles.original: 遥か遠い遠い昔　巻かれた首輪
subtitles.english: Far, far away, long ago, a collar was wrapped.

subtitles.original: 人が欲しい　人が欲しいと叫ぶ　呪いの首輪
subtitles.english: "I want people, I want people," screamed the cursed collar.

subtitles.original: 怒らないで　見捨てないで　どこも行かないで
subtitles.english: Don't be angry, don't abandon me, don't go anywhere.

subtitles.original: 強く締める　吐くまで締める　人がいない　いないと
subtitles.english: Tighten it hard, tighten it until I vomit, there's no one, no one here.

subtitles.original: いい成績でしょう　ねえ　ねえ　いい子でしょう
subtitles.english: I have good grades, right? Hey, hey, I'm a good girl, right?

subtitles.original: かわいい子でしょう　ねえ　ねえ　いい子でしょう
subtitles.english: I'm a cute girl, right? Hey, hey, I'm a good girl, right?

subtitles.original: 苦しいんで
subtitles.english: It's painful.

subtitles.original: 愛して　愛して　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me, love me.

subtitles.original: もっともっと　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me more and more.

subtitles.original: 愛して　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me.

subtitles.original: 狂おしいほどに
subtitles.english: To the point of going crazy.

subtitles.original: 苦しい　苦しい
subtitles.english: It's painful, it's painful.

subtitles.original: 呪縛を　解いて解いて　ねえ
subtitles.english: Break the spell, break it, please.

subtitles.original: 止められない　嗚呼
subtitles.english: It can't be stopped, ah.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 身体　身体　大きくなっても小さい首輪
subtitles.english: Even as my body, my body grows, the collar remains small.

subtitles.original: 苦しくなる　足りなくなる　人が　人が　足りない
subtitles.english: It gets painful, it's not enough, people, people aren't enough.

subtitles.original: クラスの誰にも負けない　綺麗な子でしょう
subtitles.english: I'm a prettier girl than anyone in the class, right?

subtitles.original: あの娘よりも　どの娘よりも　誰も彼も　私を見てよ
subtitles.english: Better than that girl, better than any girl, everyone, look at me!

subtitles.original: 体育館裏　あなたに告白を
subtitles.english: Behind the gym, I'll confess to you.

subtitles.original: 嘘みたいでしょう　あなたが好きなの　汚いあなたが
subtitles.english: It's like a lie, right? I like you, the filthy you.

subtitles.original: 愛して　愛して　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me, love me.

subtitles.original: 全部あげる　あなたに　あなたに
subtitles.english: I'll give you everything, to you, to you.

subtitles.original: 全部背負ってもらうよ
subtitles.english: I'll have you carry everything.

subtitles.original: 足りない　あなたが足りない
subtitles.english: It's not enough, you're not enough.

subtitles.original: 離さないよ　嗚呼
subtitles.english: I won't let you go, ah.

subtitles.original: ごめんなさい
subtitles.english: I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: 愛して　愛して　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me, love me.

subtitles.original: もっともっと　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me more and more.

subtitles.original: 愛して　愛して
subtitles.english: Love me, love me.

subtitles.original: 狂おしいほどに
subtitles.english: To the point of going crazy.

subtitles.original: 苦しい　離さない
subtitles.english: It's painful, I won't let go.

subtitles.original: 苦しい　もっともっと　ねえ
subtitles.english: It's painful, more and more, please.

subtitles.original: 幸せなの　嗚呼
subtitles.english: I'm happy, ah.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼ー！
subtitles.english: Aah--!

subtitles.original: お姉さんが...
subtitles.english: Big sis...

subtitles.original: コラプサーに取り込まれてるっ！
subtitles.english: She's being absorbed by a Corruptor!
